pageProduct.name: Pain Away Forte + Arthritis Cream 70g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Relief and Recovery of Joints & Muscles. Pain Away's active ingredients are traditionally used in western herbal medicine for the relief of - Symptoms of mild arthritis, bruising, mild joint pain and inflammation, muscle pain and inflammation, muscle sprains, strains & soreness.

Warnings

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and open wounds. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Contains Ethanol & Benzyl Alcohol.

Ingredients

Arnica Montana Flower Tincture, Rosemary Oil, Lavender Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Boswellia Carterii Extract. Also contains Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E.

Directions

Directions for use - Apply on and around the painful areas and rub in. Repeat up to 5 times daily. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.
